video_title: It's important to not judge others. #jayshetty #melindagates #advice
transcript:
when I learn to not judge other people I
realize you have to look at when you
judge somebody else and your fingers
poed this way you know like Byron Katie
says there's three fingers pointing this
way and so I realized if I had a
judgment about even say a friend right
well gosh I needed to look at is that is
that judgment really about them or is it
about me and so often the thing I might
be picking on in my mind about them was
actually about me and so I had to learn
to say to myself okay what is it in
myself that I don't like um and can I
just be okay with that
